explanation.Explanation:
The parameter "Fugitive emissions"" is described as Direct greenhouse gas emissions from intentional or unintentional releases
For calculating the Scope 1 activity "Total" under parameter "Fugitive emissions",the total Fugitive emissions reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Finished product sales: Total sales of the segment “Finished Products”

The parameter "Mobile combustion"" is described as Direct emissions from combustion of fuels in transportation
For calculating the Scope 1 activity "Total" under parameter "Mobile combustion",the total Mobile combustion reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Selling and distribution expenses: Amount spent on Transporting goods to their poiint of sale and manufacturing them
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Process emissions 1"" is described as Facility emissions- CO2 (biogenic or non bio-geneic), N2O, CH4
For calculating the Scope 1 activity "Total" under parameter "Process emissions 1",the total Process emissions 1 reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Revenue: Total amount of income generated by the sale of goods and services related to the primary operations of the business
 Cost of goods sold: Total amount spent on purchasing ingredients for the products sold by the company and manufacturing them
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Process emissions 2"" is described as VOC emissions- release of VOCs from chemical manufacturing processes or paint application
For calculating the Scope 1 activity "Total" under parameter "Process emissions 2",the total Process emissions 2 reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:

The parameter "Stationary combustion"" is described as Direct emissions from combustion of fuels for energy in stationary sources
For calculating the Scope 1 activity "Total" under parameter "Stationary combustion",the total Stationary combustion reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:

The parameter "Total scope 1 emission"" is described as Total direct greenhouse gas emissions from owned or controlled sources
For calculating the Scope 1 activity "Total" under parameter "Total scope 1 emission",the total Total scope 1 emission reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Revenue: Total amount of income generated by the sale of goods and services related to the primary operations of the business
 Cost of goods sold: Total amount spent on purchasing ingredients for the products sold by the company and manufacturing them
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company
 Finished product sales: Total sales of the segment “Finished Products”

The parameter "Location Based"" is described as Scope 2 emissions using grid average emission factors
For calculating the Scope 2 activity "Total" under parameter "Location Based",the total Location Based reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Market Based"" is described as Scope 2 emissions using supplier-specific emission factors
For calculating the Scope 2 activity "Total" under parameter "Market Based",the total Market Based reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Electricity Produced"" is described as Electricity generated and sold to end users
For calculating the Scope 2 activity "Total" under parameter "Electricity Produced",the total Electricity Produced reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Revenue: Total amount of income generated by the sale of goods and services related to the primary operations of the business
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Electricity Purchased"" is described as Electricity purchased from utilities/providers
For calculating the Scope 2 activity "Total" under parameter "Electricity Purchased",the total Electricity Purchased reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Revenue: Total amount of income generated by the sale of goods and services related to the primary operations of the business
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Energy Produced Direct"" is described as Direct energy produced (heat, steam, etc.)
For calculating the Scope 2 activity "Total" under parameter "Energy Produced Direct",the total Energy Produced Direct reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Revenue: Total amount of income generated by the sale of goods and services related to the primary operations of the business
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Energy Purchased Direct"" is described as Direct energy purchased from utilities/providers
For calculating the Scope 2 activity "Total" under parameter "Energy Purchased Direct",the total Energy Purchased Direct reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Revenue: Total amount of income generated by the sale of goods and services related to the primary operations of the business
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Energy Use Total"" is described as Total direct and indirect energy use
For calculating the Scope 2 activity "Total" under parameter "Energy Use Total",the total Energy Use Total reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Indirect Energy Use"" is described as Indirect energy consumption from purchased electricity, heat, etc.
For calculating the Scope 2 activity "Total" under parameter "Indirect Energy Use",the total Indirect Energy Use reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:

The parameter "Renewable Energy Produced"" is described as Renewable energy generated on-site or off-site
For calculating the Scope 2 activity "Total" under parameter "Renewable Energy Produced",the total Renewable Energy Produced reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Revenue: Total amount of income generated by the sale of goods and services related to the primary operations of the business
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Renewable Energy Purchased"" is described as Renewable energy purchased from utilities/providers
For calculating the Scope 2 activity "Total" under parameter "Renewable Energy Purchased",the total Renewable Energy Purchased reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Revenue: Total amount of income generated by the sale of goods and services related to the primary operations of the business
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Total Renewable Energy"" is described as Total renewable energy produced and purchased
For calculating the Scope 2 activity "Total" under parameter "Total Renewable Energy",the total Total Renewable Energy reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Revenue: Total amount of income generated by the sale of goods and services related to the primary operations of the business
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Category 1- Purchased goods and services"" is described as Upstream emissions from production of goods/services purchased
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 1- Purchased goods and services",the total Category 1- Purchased goods and services reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Cost of goods sold: Total amount spent on purchasing ingredients for the products sold by the company and manufacturing them

The parameter "Category 2-Capital goods"" is described as Upstream emissions from production of capital goods
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 2-Capital goods",the total Category 2-Capital goods reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company

explanation.Parameter: Category 3- Fuel-and-energy-related activities (not included in Scope 1 or 2)
explanation.Explanation:
The parameter "Category 3- Fuel-and-energy-related activities (not included in Scope 1 or 2)"" is described as Emissions related to extraction, production and transportation of fuels and energy purchased
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 3- Fuel-and-energy-related activities (not included in Scope 1 or 2)",the total Category 3- Fuel-and-energy-related activities (not included in Scope 1 or 2) reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Cost of goods sold: Total amount spent on purchasing ingredients for the products sold by the company and manufacturing them

The parameter "Category 4- Upstream transportation and distribution"" is described as Emissions from transportation and distribution of products purchased
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 4- Upstream transportation and distribution",the total Category 4- Upstream transportation and distribution reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:

The parameter "Category 5- Waste generated in operations"" is described as Emissions from disposal and treatment of waste
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 5- Waste generated in operations",the total Category 5- Waste generated in operations reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:

The parameter "Category 6- Business travel"" is described as Emissions from transportation of employees for business-related activities
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 6- Business travel",the total Category 6- Business travel reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Employee count: The number of employees working in the company

The parameter "Category 7- Employee commuting"" is described as Emissions from transportation of employees between homes and worksites
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 7- Employee commuting",the total Category 7- Employee commuting reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Employee count: The number of employees working in the company

The parameter "Category 8- Upstream leased assets"" is described as Emissions from operation of assets leased by the company
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 8- Upstream leased assets",the total Category 8- Upstream leased assets reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:

The parameter "Category 9- Downstream transportation and distribution"" is described as Emissions from transportation and distribution of sold products
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 9- Downstream transportation and distribution",the total Category 9- Downstream transportation and distribution reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Selling and distribution expenses: Amount spent on Transporting goods to their poiint of sale and manufacturing them

The parameter "Category 10- Processing of sold products"" is described as Emissions from processing of sold products by third parties
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 10- Processing of sold products",the total Category 10- Processing of sold products reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Category 11- Use of sold products"" is described as Emissions from use of sold products by end users
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 11- Use of sold products",the total Category 11- Use of sold products reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

explanation.Parameter: Category 12- End of life treatment of sold products
explanation.Explanation:
The parameter "Category 12- End of life treatment of sold products"" is described as Emissions from disposal and treatment of sold products at the end of their life
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 12- End of life treatment of sold products",the total Category 12- End of life treatment of sold products reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company

The parameter "Category 13- Downstream leased assets"" is described as Emissions from operation of assets owned and leased to third parties
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 13- Downstream leased assets",the total Category 13- Downstream leased assets reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:

The parameter "Category 14- Franchises"" is described as Emissions from operation of franchises not included in Scope 1 or 2
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 14- Franchises",the total Category 14- Franchises reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Concentrate Operations revenue share: Revenue share of the segment “Concentrate Operations” as part of the company’s total sales
 Concentrate Sales: Total sales of the segment “Concentrate Operations”

explanation.Parameter: Category 15- Investments [row hidden for FS sector companies, data point requested in C-FS14.1a]
explanation.Explanation:
The parameter "Category 15- Investments"" is described as Emissions associated with investments (requested separately for financial sector companies)
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Category 15- Investments",the total Category 15- Investments reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:

The parameter "Other downstream emissions"" is described as Other indirect emissions from downstream in the value chain
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Other downstream emissions",the total Other downstream emissions reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:

The parameter "Other upstream emissions"" is described as Other indirect emissions from upstream in the value chain
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Other upstream emissions",the total Other upstream emissions reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:

The parameter "Total scope 3 emission"" is described as Total indirect emissions from activities in the value chain
For calculating the Scope 3 activity "Total" under parameter "Total scope 3 emission",the total Total scope 3 emission reported by Ryder was used as a starting point.
Then, The yearly trend of the parameters below was used for correlation analysis to determine confidence in the reported value and to ajdust the corresponding estimate accordingly:
 Revenue: Total amount of income generated by the sale of goods and services related to the primary operations of the business
 Cost of goods sold: Total amount spent on purchasing ingredients for the products sold by the company and manufacturing them
 Property, plant and equipment: Total monetary value of property, plants and equipment owned by the company
 Volume sold: The total actual quantity of goods sold by the company
 Concentrate Operations revenue share: Revenue share of the segment “Concentrate Operations” as part of the company’s total sales
 Concentrate Sales: Total sales of the segment “Concentrate Operations”
